speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Lisa from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm fine, but why are you calling me?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm reaching out regarding your outstanding balance with XYZ Bank. We need to discuss your account.

speaker: Customer
text: I don’t want to talk about it. Please put me on your do not call list.

speaker: Agent
text: I completely understand. I apologize for the inconvenience. Let me ensure your number is marked as do not call.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you. I really don’t want any more calls.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome. I've processed your request to be added to the do not call list.
